Class PuzzleModule

java.lang.Object
  edu.rpi.phil.legup.PuzzleModule
public class PuzzleModule
extends java.lang.Object

Generic Puzzle class. All puzzles should extend this class and implement the Puzzle specific functionality

Version:
1.0
Author:
Drew Housten

getNextCellValue

public int getNextCellValue(int x,
                            int y,
                            int branchNumber,
                            BoardState boardState)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Gets the next cell value for a specified cell in a boardstate

Parameters:
x - Row coordinate of the cell
y - Column coordinate of the cell
boardState - BoardState that the cell should be looked up in
branchNumber - The Branch Number to cycle
Returns:
The next cell value
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if x or y are invalid

Checks if the current board is the goal board

Returns:
